Activity.Name: Append Line
Activity.ToolTip: Appends the specified string to the file, and if the file does not exist, it is created.

Activity.Name: Copy File
Activity.ToolTip: Copy files from the specified location to another location.

Activity.Name: Create File
Activity.ToolTip: Create a file at the specified location.

Activity.Name: Create Folder
Activity.ToolTip: Create a directory at the specified location.

Activity.Name: Delete
Activity.ToolTip: Delete files or folders in the specified location.

Activity.Name: File Change Trigger
Activity.ToolTip: File change event.

Activity.Name: Move File
Activity.ToolTip: Move a file from a specified location to another location.

Activity.Name: Path Exists
Activity.ToolTip: Check if the specified path exists. This path can represent a file path or a directory path.

Activity.Name: Read Text File
Activity.ToolTip: Read all characters from the specified file.

Activity.Name: Write Text File
Activity.ToolTip: Writes the specified text to the file and the existing text is overwritten.

Activity.Name: Copy Selected Text
Activity.ToolTip: Use the clipboard function to get the selected text.

Activity.Name: Get From Clipboard
Activity.ToolTip: Retrieve data from the clipboard.

Activity.Name: Set To Clipboard
Activity.ToolTip: Place the specified text/file on the clipboard.

Activity.Name: Close Application
Activity.ToolTip: Close the application that corresponds to the specified UI element.

Activity.Name: Get Processes
Activity.ToolTip: Get a list of all running processes.

Activity.Name: Kill Process
Activity.ToolTip: Terminate the specified process.

Activity.Name: Start Process
Activity.ToolTip: Start the specified application and optionally pass a list of parameters to it.

Activity.Name: Callout
Activity.ToolTip: Displays a pop-up with a title and text on the specified UI element for a certain amount of time.

Activity.Name: Custom Input
Activity.ToolTip: Shows the HTML file that sends the data back to the workflow.

Activity.Name: Input Dialog
Activity.ToolTip: A dialog box is displayed prompting the user with a tag message and an input field.

Activity.Name: Message Box
Activity.ToolTip: Displays a message box with the given text with button options.

Activity.Name: Select File
Activity.ToolTip: Open a dialog to select a file.

Activity.Name: Select Folder
Activity.ToolTip: Open the dialog to select a folder.

Activity.Name: Beep
Activity.ToolTip: Buzzer or system beep, etc.

Activity.Name: Get Environment Folder
Activity.ToolTip: Get the path to the specified system special folder

Activity.Name: Get Environment Variable
Activity.ToolTip: Get the contents of the specified environment variable

Activity.Name: Get Password
Activity.ToolTip: Encrypt the password by associating it with the current user. Only workflows running under the current user context can decrypt the password.

Activity.Name: Invoke PowerShell
Activity.ToolTip: Execute command line commands or scripts

Activity.Name: Get Current Date/Time
Activity.ToolTip: Get current date/time

Activity.Name: Date Time Conversion
Activity.ToolTip: Date time conversion

Activity.Name: Get Credentials
Activity.ToolTip: Use the provided AssetName to get the specified credentials and return the username and security password.

Activity.Name: Set Credentials
Activity.ToolTip: Enables you to update the value of the indicated credential asset, which is already available in the Windows Credentials list, whether it is a global asset or a personal computer asset.

Activity.Name: Invoke Code
Activity.ToolTip: Synchronous execution of VB.Net code, support for passing parameters

Activity.Name: Invoke Workflow File
Activity.ToolTip: Synchronous execution of a workflow file, support for passing parameters

Activity.Name: Monitor Events
Activity.ToolTip: User event

Activity.Name: Comment
Activity.ToolTip: Add a comment to the workflow

Activity.Name: Comment Out
Activity.ToolTip: a container, the activity placed inside will not be executed

Activity.Name: Log Message
Activity.ToolTip: Print logs to output windows and log files

Activity.Name: Add Data Column
Activity.ToolTip: Add DataColumn to the specified DataTable

Activity.Name: Add Data Row
Activity.ToolTip: Add a DataRow to the specified DataTable

Activity.Name: Build Data Table
Activity.ToolTip: Create a DataTable based on the specified pattern

Activity.Name: Clear Data Table
Activity.ToolTip: Clear all data in the specified DataTable

Activity.Name: Filter Data Table
Activity.ToolTip: Lets you DataTable filter variables by specifying conditions in the Filter Wizard window. Activities can retain or delete rows or columns based on logical conditions specified in the wizard. The event body contains a 'Filter Wizard' button so you can access the wizard and customize your settings at any time

Activity.Name: Generate Data Table
Activity.ToolTip: Generate DataTable variables from unstructured data. This activity allows you to select column and row separators based on the generated table.

Activity.Name: Get Row Item
Activity.ToolTip: Get the value from the DataRow variable based on the specified column

Activity.Name: Join Data Tables
Activity.ToolTip: Combine rows from two tables with the same value as each other according to the Join rule specified in the JoinType property

Activity.Name: Lookup Data Table
Activity.ToolTip: This activity enables you to search the specified provided value, DataTable and return the RowIndex where it was found. This activity can also help you return the value found in the cell with the row coordinates specified in the RowIndex property and the column coordinates specified in the Target Column property category.

Activity.Name: Merge Data Table
Activity.ToolTip: Merge the specified DataTable with the current DataTable, Indicates whether changes are retained and how to handle missing schemas in the current DataTable

Activity.Name: Output Data Table
Activity.ToolTip: Write a DataTable to a string using the CSV format

Activity.Name: Delete Data Column
Activity.ToolTip: Remove DataColumn from the specified DataTable

Activity.Name: Delete Data Row
Activity.ToolTip: Remove DataColumn from the specified DataTable

Activity.Name: Delete Duplicate Rows
Activity.ToolTip: Remove duplicate row data from the specified DataTable

Activity.Name: Sort Data Table
Activity.ToolTip: The DataTable sorts the integers in ascending or descending order based on the value of the specified column.
